soap_classification.prediction.TFIDF package

Submodules

soap_classification.prediction.TFIDF.tfidf_classifier module

soap_classification.prediction.TFIDF.tfidf_evaluation module

soap_classification.prediction.TFIDF.tfidf_svd_cosine module

soap_classification.prediction.TFIDF.tfidf_svd_cosine.classify_with_cosine_similarity(query, X_train_tfidf_reduced, y_train, vectorizer, k=5)

Classify a query using cosine similarity.

Parameters:

  • query (str) – The query to be classified.

  • X_train_tfidf_reduced (array-like) – Training data TF-IDF matrix with reduced dimensions.

  • y_train (array-like) – Training data labels.

  • vectorizer (Vectorizer) – The TF-IDF vectorizer used for transforming the data.

  • k (int, optional) – The number of nearest neighbors to consider. Defaults to 5.

Returns:

A dictionary containing normalized votes for each class based on cosine similarity.

Return type:

dict

soap_classification.prediction.TFIDF.train_tfidf module

soap_classification.prediction.TFIDF.train_tfidf.train_tfidf_classifier(dataset_file)

Train a TF-IDF classifier on the provided dataset.

Args: - dataset_file (str): Path to the CSV file containing the dataset.

Returns: - clf (Pipeline): Trained classification pipeline.
